blogPost.excerpt: ABBYY FineScanner AI is the best in class scanning app that turns your mobile device into a productivity tool to quickly capture documents and books, create digital copies in PDF and DOCX, and recognize text on scans for further editing and sharing.
blogPost.body: ABBYY FineScanner AI is the best in class scanning app that turns your mobile device into a productivity tool to quickly capture documents and books, create digital copies in PDF and DOCX, and recognize text on scans for further editing and sharing.
blogPost.title: ABBYY FineScanner AI 8 - Smart scanner app to make your remote work easy
blogPost.author: Stewart Rogers

localize.description: ABBYY FineScanner AI是同类扫描应用中的佼佼者，它能将您的移动设备变成生产力工具，快速捕捉文档和书籍，创建PDF和DOCX格式的数字副本，并识别扫描件上的文本，以便进一步编辑和分享。
localize.tagline: 智能扫描仪应用，让你的远程工作更轻松

localize.description: ABBYY FineScanner AI是同類掃描應用中的佼佼者，它能將您的移動設備變成生產力工具，快速捕捉文檔和書籍，創建PDF和DOCX格式的數字副本，並識別掃描件上的文本，以便進一步編輯和分享。
localize.tagline: 智能掃描儀應用，讓你的遠程工作更輕鬆

previous.title: "It’s really stupid to have a culture which encourages [so] much gambling in stocks by people who have the mindset of racetrack bettors and, of course, it will create trouble, as it did," Charlie Munger said. https://t.co/Ly5YNTew8K

localize.full_text: "如果有一种文化，鼓励[如此]具有赛马场赌徒心态的人在股票上进行赌博，那真的很愚蠢，当然，它会制造麻烦，就像它一样，"查理-芒格说。https://t.co/Ly5YNTew8K。
"如果有一種文化，鼓勵[如此]具有賽馬場賭徒心態的人在股票上進行賭博，那真的很愚蠢，當然，它會製造麻煩，就像它一樣，"查理-芒格說。https://t.co/Ly5YNTew8K。
